senses.synonym: greatness: the property possessed by something or someone of outstanding importance or eminence <i64148>

relations.target: epic: very imposing or impressive; surpassing the ordinary (especially in size or scale); 'an epic voyage'; 'of heroic proportions'; 'heroic sculpture' <i7547>
